Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.3 Paccayavāra » 10.3.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
61.
1230Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte terasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte ekādasa, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1231Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
